title: Burial acolyte
data:
{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Burial acolytes''' can be found in [[ossuary|ossuaries]] and rarely in [[the Crypt]]. They are often found alongside [[derived undead]] allies and will buff them with [[swiftness]] and [[might]]. They can also heal them for small amounts with [[Malign Offering]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Take them out before they can buff their undead friends. Use [[javelin]]s or other piercing/smite targeted abilities if they are behind said undead. 
*Undead players should be wary of letting them get into melee range, where they will become susceptible to [[Dispel Undead]].
*[[Negative energy resistance]] can mitigate the damage of Malign Offering.
*By the time you see them in Crypt, they are flimsy enemies compared to most of the other inhabitants.

==History==
*Burial Acolytes were added in [[0.31]].
